title: Prestige Browliner, Blonde, 0.04 Ounce
description: Easy one stroke application glides on smoothly without tugging or pulling.  The Prestige Eyebrown Pencil comes in a sleek silver barrel with quick-reference color matched end.  Use Prestige Sharpener #6002 for best results.

title: Queen Helene Masque, Mud Pack - 8 oz
description: The Original Natural English Clay Mud Pack MasqueAn old-fashioned, time-tested earth facial treatment.Relaxes Tired Face MusclesTightens Sagging SkinSoftens Lines and WrinklesThe original old-fashioned, time-tested earth facial treatment.  Mud Pack Masque, with imported natural English clay, will work wonders for your skin. It's a very effective pore cleanser.  It tightens loose, sagging skin on your face and neck, stimulates blood circulation, relaxes tired face muscles and softens lines and wrinkles.Enjoy a Mud Pack Masque facial as a "pick-me-up" when you feel tired, when you're preparing to go out for the evening or before going to bed.  Your reward will be a clear, smooth, refreshed skin and a healthier, youthful-looking complexion.No animal testing.  No animal ingredients.Queen Helene ~ Environmentally Concerned.Made in USA
